com.jcabi.xml

Interface XSD

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    XSDDocument

    @Immutable
public interface XSD
    XSD schema.

    Implementation of this interface must be immutable and thread-safe.

    Since:
    0.5
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@tpc2.com)
    See Also:
    XSDDocument
